title: Mirillis Splash Premium v2.0.0.0
description:
https://mirillis.com/en/

 
https://mirillis.com/en/products/splash-free-hd-video-player.html



What's new?
-----------------
New feature: New Splash User Interface with a few color themes
New feature: Support for NVIDIA NVENC video encoding acceleration added
New feature: Support for AMD APP video encoding acceleration added
New feature: 4k video playback support added
Fixed exporting/uploading videos to YouTube
OS: Windows XP(SP3), Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10



Screens
----------
 
http://someimage.com/iu0q

- It's better to do this offline (optional)

- Install 'Splash', do not open app after installation.

- Double click on 'Activation' reg key.

- Run the app.

- Go to 'Settings', uncheck 'Check for updates'
